text:
The fourth season of "Fargo", an American anthology black comedy–crime drama television series created by Noah Hawley. It premiered on September 27, 2020, on FX and ended on November 29, 2020. It has about 11 episodes.
The fourth season is set in 1950 in Kansas City. It shows the crime war between to mafia organizations. Chris Rock plays Loy Cannon, the head of a crime mafia made up of black criminals trying to escape from the Jim Crow South.
The season was originally scheduled to premiere on April 19, 2020, but it was pushed back because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
It has a 81% approval from Rotten Tomatoes, and is the lowest rated season from the entire "Fargo" series.
